name: Catocalypse (Neshtyak)
description:
The witch Aerys was working on a potion and her cat fell into the vat. The cat's fur getting into the potion was the beginning of the inevitable... 

Mutant cats begin to crawl out of the vat, seeking to explore the environment and thus destroying the Witch's house.

How long can Aerys delay the house's inevitable destruction?

In order to prevent damage, you need to:

- stop cats for a while by enticing them with a toy or using some kind of counteraction

- repair broken things, which will replenish the condition of the house a little

Target:

-  last as long as possible

This house will not save anything from the invasion of mutant cats ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

Controls

WASD or left click - Move
Key  "1" - Imprison in a flask ability
Key  "2" - Bubble encapsulation ability
Key  "3" - Water spray ability    
Key  "4" - Toy ability  
Key "E" - Item repair ability 

Developers:
  • Neshitova Anna - lead, gamedesigner, animations
  • Zyz Nikita - programmer
  • Danishevsky Ilya - assembly in Unity
  • Mikhaltsov Timofey - art
  • Nikulina Kristina - art
  • Music band "марк грейвз"
